channel.title: Need help making a command.bat for czar
channel.description: well i got the command.bat so far but idk if like im sopose to be able to? or like.. how to transfer it into the client, and yes my compile does work :X please help?

item.title: Need help making a command.bat for czar
item.dc:creator: @killerm killerm
item.description:
@killerm wrote:

so…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Steve"))

so like

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cash”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Steve”))? doesnt sound right to me?[br][br][size=1][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 04:24:12 PM[/size][hr]can any one elese help out?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making a command.bat for czar
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

o go into your client.java find

"noclip"

then copy that whole command, chcnage hte noclip to the command you want and change the inside to what ever you want.
